text: Girl In a Coma is a rock band from San Antonio, Texas on Joan Jett's Blackheart Record's label. The band is made up of sisters Nina(vocals/guitar) and Phanie Diaz (drums) and Jenn Alva (bass). The group recorded a rock version of the song "Si Una Vez" by Selena. ==Discography== * 2007 "Both Before I'm Gone" ==Other websites== *Official site Category:American rock bands Category:American punk bands Category:Musicians from San Antonio, Texas Category:Musical groups from Texas
title: Girl in a Coma
